== Gloom ==
=== Installation ===
==== Binaries ====
<pre>
mkdir /<path to install>/quake2/gloom
cd /<path to install>/quake2/gloom
wget ftp://ftp.planetgloom.com/files/dll/linux/gamei386.2006-05-23.so.gz
gunzip gamei386.2006-05-23.so.gz
ln -s gamei386.2006-05-23.so gamei386.so
</pre>

==== Models/Textures/Sounds ====
<pre>
cd /<path to install>/quake2
wget ftp://ftp.planetgloom.com/files/gloom13full.7z
7z x gloom13full.7z
</pre>

==== All Map Pack ====
<pre>
cd /<path to install>/quake2/gloom
wget ftp://ftp.planetgloom.com/maps/Gloom.All.Map.Pack.2004-12-19.PAKs.7z
7z x Gloom.All.Map.Pack.2004-12-19.PAKs.7z
</pre>

<pre>
set adr0 "65.98.42.3:27910"     //MaF Gloom 7on7
set adr1 "70.86.44.154:27910"   //QDev Gloom 40 Player
set adr2 "194.251.249.58:27910" //eDome Quake2 Gloom
set adr3 "24.22.249.137:27910"  //Unlimited Frags
set adr4 "195.148.48.204:27910" //The Aristocrats Gloom

set adr6 "85.10.210.199:27912"  //[quake.de] Gloom 6v6 ACC
set adr7 "203.206.95.1:27913"   //OGN's [Gloom]
